author: IGN
description:
Watch the Characters Reborn Featurette for Daredevil: Born Again, the official introduction to Daredevil as a series to the MCU that started on Netflix distributed by Marvel Studios. The cast of Daredevil: Born Again reunite to discuss their characters in this new series premiering March 4 at 6 pm PT/9 pm ET only on Disney Plus.

In Daredevil: Born Again, Matt Murdock (Charlie Cox), a blind lawyer with heightened abilities, is fighting for justice through his bustling law firm, while former mob boss Wilson Fisk (Vincent D’Onofrio) pursues his own political endeavors in New York. When their past identities begin to emerge, both men find themselves on an inevitable collision course.

The series also stars Margarita Levieva, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Wilson Bethel, Zabryna Guevara, Nikki M. James, Genneya Walton, Arty Froushan, Clark Johnson, Michael Gandolfini, with Ayelet Zurer and Jon Bernthal. 

Dario Scardapane is showrunner. Episodes are directed by Justin Benson & Aaron Moo
title: Daredevil: Born Again - Official 'Characters Reborn' Featurette (2025) Charlie Cox, Deborah Ann Woll

author: IGN
description:
Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii is here! In this video, we’ll provide some crucial tips for starting your pirate adventure out right. Pirate Yakuza is a seemingly straightforward game, but we have some great suggestions that can keep you from getting landlocked in a boss fight, spending too much time in the wrong areas, or running out of money.

00:00 - Intro
00:27 - Mainline to The Hook
02:15 - Upgrade Health and Strength Early
03:06 - Fast Ways to Get Money and Upgrades
04:27 - Leveling your Pirate Crew
06:18 - Find all the Dark Instruments

#LikeADragonPirateYakuzaInHawaii #Gaming #IGN
title: Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii - 5 Important Things to Know Before Setting Sail!

author: IGN
description:
Check out the updated crowd entrance for Jey Uso in WWE 2K25!

The 2025 Royal Rumble winner, Main Event Jey Uso now has a second entrance in WWE 2K25 for larger arenas, replicating the real-life experience of Jey Uso coming out from the crowd. WWE 2K25 now includes Jey Uso's entrance from the crowd and you can watch it right here, exclusively with IGN First.

#IGN #Gaming #WWE2K25
title: WWE 2K25: Jey Uso Crowd Entrance - IGN First

author: IGN
description:
Iconic horror novelist Stephen King has had a ton movies adapted from his work -- and that's not counting TV shows and miniseries. And there's simply no sign of slowing down, what with the recent Salem's Lot movie, Osgood Perkins' The Monkey, and more adaptations in the pipeline like The Dark Tower.

With so many films to choose from, what are the best Stephen King adaptations? We've whittled this massive catalogue down to 13 movies. From ghosts to psychics to... ghosts wanting to feed on psychics, these are truly the movies that not only captured the best of King's work, but also became cinema classics in their own right.

But what lands at the top of the heap? The Shining? The Dead Zone? Carrie? It? It Chapter Two!? There are so many Stephen King movies to choose from, and The Monkey is certainly worthy of this list as well, so watch the full video and then let us know what your list would look like!

#IGN #Movies
title: The 13 Best Stephen King Movies of All Time

author: IGN
description:
Well well well, look what’s back again: the month of March, right on schedule, and it’s bringing a bunch of new video games along for the ride! Who could have anticipated this. Welp, we did, here are March 2025’s biggest game releases.

00:00 Intro, Carmen Sandiego, Age of Mythology Retold: Immortal Pillars, Two Point Museum
02:06 Everhood 2, Suikoden 1 & 2 HD Remaster: Gate Rune and Dunan Unification Wars, Split Fiction
02:58 FragPunk, Do No Harm, Dragonkin: The Banished
04:05 WWE 2K25, Sugardew Island Your Cozy Farm Shop, Rise of the Ronin
05:05 Wanderstop, Dungeons of Hinterburg, MLB the Show 25
06:07 Assassin’s Creed Shadows, Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition, Atelier Yumia: The Alchemist of Memories & the Envisioned Land
08:25 Killing Floor 3, JDM: Japanese Drift Master, Atomfall
09:38 Hitman: World of Assassination, Bubble Ghost Remake
10:46 The First Berserker: Khazan, inZOI

Split Fiction - PS5 | https://zdcs.link/9166wq
Split Fiction - Xbox | https://zdcs.link/aX224
title: The Biggest Game Releases of March 2025

author: IGN
description:
Join the cast and crew of Daredevil: Born Again for a behind-the-scenes look at the upcoming Marvel Television series, as the team discusses starting the journey again. Daredevil: Born Again stars Charlie Cox and Vincent D’Onofrio. Daredevil: Born Again premieres on Disney+ on March 4 at 6pm PT/9pm ET.

In Daredevil: Born Again, Matt Murdock (Charlie Cox), a blind lawyer with heightened abilities, is fighting for justice through his bustling law firm, while former mob boss Wilson Fisk (Vincent D’Onofrio) pursues his own political endeavors in New York. When their past identities begin to emerge, both men find themselves on an inevitable collision course.

The series also stars Margarita Levieva, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Wilson Bethel, Zabryna Guevara, Nikki M. James, Genneya Walton, Arty Froushan, Clark Johnson, Michael Gandolfini, with Ayelet Zurer and Jon Bernthal. 

Dario Scardapane is showrunner. Episodes are directed by Justin Benson & Aaron Moorhead, Michael Cuesta, Jeff
title: Daredevil: Born Again - Official Behind the Scenes Clip (2025) Charlie Cox, Vincent D’Onofrio

author: IGN
description:
Check out action-packed gameplay from Kijutsu Rider in this trailer for the upcoming fast-paced third-person hack-and-slash anime-styled action game. In Kijutsu Rider, you play as one of five unstoppable heroes as you carve through waves of monstrous enemies, take down the black cross conglomerate, and save the world. Kijutsu Rider will be available on PC in 2026.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Kijutsu Rider - Official Gameplay Trailer | Black Voices in Gaming 2025
